name: Ewok Sentry
Lore: 'Ewok sentries Scout the perimeter of their domain. Their watchful eyes search for both predatory animals and invading stormtroopers.',
Text: 'Deploys only on Endor. Power and forfeit +1 for each Light side icon at same Endor site. May deploy as a ''react''. May move as a ''react'' (for free) to a battle where you have a unique (•) Ewok.',
